## LinearCardContainer.insert() method

Add a single card to the given place in this container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
insert(index: number, card: TCard): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Where to insert the card, starting at 0. |
|  card | TCard | Card to add. |

**Returns:**

void
